lyrics:

We'll make great pets

My friend says we're like the dinosaurs

Much faster than they ever did

We'll make great pets
We'll make great pets
We'll make great pets
We'll make great pets
We'll make great pets
We'll make great pets

We'll make great pets

We will make great pets
